articles.description: The Milky Way's supermassive black hole has come to light after a new study found that powerful jets spewing out of it have created two massive bubbles.
articles.content: The supermassive black hole sitting at the center of the Milky Way has again come to light after a new study found that the powerful jets spewing out of it have created two massive bubbles extending … [+1886 chars]

articles.title: Strike confirmed! Juno captures 5,000 kg asteroid hitting Jupiter's upper atmosphere - India Today
articles.description: The Juno spacecraft orbiting Jupiter has observed an asteroid crashing into the planet's upper atmosphere and scientist are hopeful it will reveal new secrets.

articles.author: Passant Rabie
articles.title: The largest molecule ever found in a proto-planet disc could be a precursor to life - Inverse
articles.description: Astronomers detected the largest molecule ever found in a planet forming disc, which could lead to organic molecules.
articles.content:
In the surroundings of a young star located 444 light years away,
 a team of astronomers found what may be the precursor to life itself.
